kolambaa ahasa hiruge ayithiya sanduta pawarannata sudanam...ee ayithi huwamaruwa hamadama puruddata wunath mata puluwan da numbaata hara mage ayithiya wena kenekuta pawaranna..thamath mama ara simenthi bankuwa uda...api kanna gaththu wade uraya bhagayayi hiswune...mata thibune eeka iwara wenakanwath ee gana numbaen ahanne nathuwa inna...mokada numbaa ada aaweth wenada widiyatama aadaren inna...eeth mama aawema ginnakin awilemin ee ginnen numbaa da pichchenne mama da pichchenne kiyalawath hithaganna bariwa....ithin wenadata numbaatath wada aadaren me hamuwa balaporoththu wena mata ada me hamuwa thawath kal giya nan headeyi kiyala hithunu wara ganana ananthayi....mokada numbaa nodannawata mama danagena hitiya me awasanaya mokak wunath ada mata widaganna wena bawa....ee monawa wunath puruddata numbaata gena ra bath parsalaya mage ath bagaye bala innawa numbae ath atharata madiwela yanna....
